alerts.description: Round Robin Lead Assignment - All Other Regions
Round Robin Lead Assignment - Webcast Australia
Send new lead notification to Lead Owner

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(CONTAINS( $RecordType.Name, "PGi"), "PGi", IF(CONTAINS( $RecordType.Name, "Modality"), "Modality", IF(CONTAINS( $RecordType.Name, "ReadyTalk"), "ReadyTalk", IF(CONTAINS( $RecordType.Name, "TalkPoint"), "TalkPoint", IF(CONTAINS( $RecordType.Name, "iMC"), "iMC", NULL)))))
fieldUpdates.name: All - Set Deupe Record Type

fieldUpdates.description: when a Lead is created with the Lead Source of Inbound Call, I need it to be automatically set to the Marketing Channel NA: Online, so that Marketing can better track and report Leads.
fieldUpdates.name: PGi-Inbound Call

fieldUpdates.description: If "Related Account Name" and "Potential Account Matches" fields are blank, update "Is Lead tied to an Account" field to NO, if those fields are filled, update to YES.
fieldUpdates.name: PGi-Is Lead Tied to an Account Update

fieldUpdates.description: When the "gaURL" field is populated, also populate the "firstKnownChannel_Timestamp" field.
fieldUpdates.name: PGi-Lead, UTM Date Stamp
Set Company Name to be Account Name

fieldUpdates.description: to be used for list views
fieldUpdates.name: Set Description (1st 100)
Set Email Opt Out to True
Set Last Mod Date by Non-Admin
Set Lead Routed by DB back to False

fieldUpdates.description: when dials is greater than 0, sets the lead status to working, only if the lead status currently is Open Unqualified.
fieldUpdates.name: Set Lead Status to Working
Set Opt In Date to TODAY()
Set Opt Out Date to TODAY()
Update Canada lead Email with Email

fieldUpdates.description: If the Lead or Account have a Clean Status = Skipped then to update the Clean Status field back to blank.
fieldUpdates.name: Update Clean Status

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the custom Lead Description field from the standard Description field.
fieldUpdates.name: Update Custom Lead Description Field
Update Lead Status Reason to blank

rules.fullName: ALL-Canada Leads not from SF Marketing Cloud Integration%28step1%29
rules.description: Sets Email Opt Out to True when lead is created for Canada (except if created by SF Marketing Cloud Integration)

rules.fullName: ALL-Canada Leads not from SF Marketing Cloud Integration%28step2%29
rules.description: Moves the email address to Canada Hidden Email field when the lead is created for Canada region but did not get created from SF Marketing Cloud Integration

rules.fullName: ALL-Canada Leads not from SF Marketing Cloud Integration%28step3%29
rules.description: Replace normal email field with generic noemailingcanada@pgi.com email

rules.fullName: ALL-Canada Leads not from SF Marketing Cloud Integration%28step4%29
rules.description: Move email from Canada Hidden Email field back to normal Email field, as customer has been marked as opted in for email marketing
Notify sales user when a lead is updated and Opt Out = TRUE
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISNEW() = TRUE), ISCHANGED(HasOptedOutOfEmail), HasOptedOutOfEmail = TRUE )

rules.fullName: ALL-Set Company Name to be Account Name
ALL-Set Email Opt Out Date to TODAY
rules.description: sets opt out date when opt out becomes TRUE

rules.fullName: ALL-Set Last Mod by Non-Admin Date
rules.description: Sets the Last Modified Date by Non-Admin

rules.fullName: ALL-Set Last Mod by Non-Admin Name

criteriaItems.value: System Admin API Only,System Administrator,PGi Sales Operations

rules.description: Sets the Name of the user who last modified the record if they are not system admin or api user

rules.fullName: ALL-Set Opt In Date to TODAY
rules.description: Sets Date Opt In to TODAY whenever Email Opt Out has changed from True to False
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISNEW() = TRUE), ISCHANGED(HasOptedOutOfEmail), HasOptedOutOfEmail = FALSE )

rules.description: If the Initial Product Family of Interest or Initial Product Family of Interest equals Webcast then set the RR Initial Product Family of Interest to "Webcast".
If the Lead or Account have a Clean Status = Skipped then to update the Clean Status field back to blank.
Set Disqualification Date when Lead Status is set to "Disqualified".
Sets field used in matching and duplicate rules
Evaluates when a round robin assignee is assigned in order to send an email to the lead owner on Create
Rule used to evaluate if the Round Robin Assignee changes in order to send an email alert to the new owner.

rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( OwnerId), CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), OR( OwnerId="00G1B000004F70Q", OwnerId="00G13000003pdaG"))

rules.description: Set Disqualification Date when Lead Status is set to "Disqualified".
Delete stale leads in Competitor or Potential Junk queues
Captures prior owner when lead is disqualified

rules.formula: AND( Owner:User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001rSOR", NOT(ISPICKVAL( LeadSource,'Lead Gen - Talkpoint')), CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), OR(Owner:User.Id <> "", OwnerId = "00G13000003t04l"), OR( CreatedBy.Profile.Id = "00e30000001rSOR", CreatedBy.Id = "0051300000BAPRk", CreatedBy.Id = "0051300000C42An", CreatedBy.Id = "005300000063Gke"), OR(ISPICKVAL( LeadSource, 'Web Chat')) )

rules.description: when a Lead is created with the Lead Source of Inbound Call, I need it to be automatically set to the Marketing Channel NA: Online, so that Marketing can better track and report Leads.
Anytime a lead owned by an Intl user is disqualified

Tagging the field "MQL Intl Lead" if the lead ownership is ever under queue "PGi-Lead-International Online" and is then moved to another que or user except if moved to "PGi-Lead-Intl Disqualified Leads"
Anytime a lead owned by the Intl Disqualified que and Status changes from being Disqualified it is to move to Intl Online

rules.fullName: PGi-Is Lead Tied to an Account Update

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR (4 AND 5) OR (4 AND 6 AND 7))

criteriaItems.value: Contact Us,Demo Request,Lead Gen: BDR,Lead Gen: HQL,Free Trial - Webcast

rules.description: Will assign a lead to Round Robin queue once it meets a qualified lead score.

rules.description: Will assign a lead to International Online que once it meets appended with an APAC or EMEA country

rules.fullName: PGi-Lead%2C UTM First Known Channel Updates

rules.description: Anytime a lead owned by an NA user is disqualified
If a Lead has a status of Disqualified or Nurture - and receives an MQL Assignment Date value, please re-set the Lead Status to Assigned. And also remove the Lead Status Reason.
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Disqualified"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Nurture")), ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(MQL_Assignment_Date__c)), ISCHANGED(MQL_Assignment_Date__c))

rules.description: To set the lead source if the lead comes from Olark Chat tool
Notify Users when Ownership changes

rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS( RecordType.Name, "PGi"), LEFT(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId ),3)="00G", Owner:Queue.QueueName = "", Owner:User.Id <> "")

rules.description:
When then Lead Routed by DB is true, this will email out a new lead assigned notification to the lead owner and set the value back to False
Lead Routed by DB is set by the other RoundRobin WFR
If the RoundRobin (aka Unassigned) que is used then this will mark the Lead Routed by DB field as true
Sets the date of when Marketing Opt-In becomes true
Captures the date that the lead status becomes Nuture
moves a RT lead to the Junk Queue if the lead status is ever set to "unqualified"

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 OR 19 OR 20)
